summary: This document discusses an alert regarding Richard D. Kahn, who was initially flagged due to a false positive related to compliance issues with a different individual of the same name. After review, it was determined that Richard D. Kahn is not the same person as the one flagged, and he has been cleared for compliance purposes. The document includes internal communications among compliance staff at Deutsche Bank Securities.

events.title: Compliance Alert Issued
events.description: An alert was issued regarding Richard D. Kahn due to a potential compliance issue.

events.title: Alert Cleared
events.description: The compliance alert for Richard D. Kahn was cleared after further review determined it was a false positive.

keyFacts: Richard D. Kahn was initially flagged due to a false positive alert related to another individual with the same name.
The compliance team at Deutsche Bank Securities reviewed the alert and found Richard D. Kahn's statements reasonable.
Richard D. Kahn has been working at HBRK Associates Inc for the past three years.
The alert involved a Richard Kahn who was associated with PennMont Securities, which was banned from NYSE Arca.
The document includes internal communications regarding the compliance process for Richard D. Kahn.
